title: "Make Firefox your default browser" appears repeatedly on Debian 13 KDE
content:
Often (though not always) Firefox will prompt me to "Make Firefox your default browser" when first run or when run after being closed, despite me clicking "Set as default browser".

According to "KDE Settings / Default Applications", Firefox ESR is the default web browser and the default file association for HTML files. Firefox and Chromium (and I presume Konqueror) are installed. A similar laptop with similar software on it does not exhibit the problem.

What is Firefox actually checking to determine whether it needs to ask "Set as default browser"?

content:
Hello,

In the last few days, my Firefox has been changing languages on its own. Today, after an update, a language like Swedish or something similar appeared.

Why is that?

Thank you. Christian.

title: what browsers does firefox support that allows AI to be shutdown?
content:
bold text I use duck duck go, but I want to shut down AI in my search engine. What search engine does FireFox support that allows for AI to be disabled permanently?

The AI answers and responses are colored. I don't want my searches to be part of an AI "learning" moment. My searches should be completed and not "filtered" or "interpreted" but simply the results displayed.

Best advice Modzilla, Don't "loose" me on this request. When I leave something it is permanent; I don't look back. Just saying.

title: Firefox is putting me on Japanese versions of every website I go to even though my preferred language is English.
content: Firefox is ignoring my preferred language and using the Japanese versions of every single website I go to. My only preferred language is English, there is NOTHING else. This has been happening for months now, and the only way I've found to deal with this is to turn on a VPN, and I don't want to have to turn on a VPN every time I'm using this search engine. Just to add extra information, I live in Japan, this wouldn't happen if I were in the US, but I'm not in the US, and the search engine knows that, and keeps putting me on Japanese websites. This is getting really frustrating and it seems like the settings cannot do anything. Also I am aware there is a translation feature, but it takes long to load depending on the page, isn't accurate, and doesn't translate everything.
creator: jayfaychaych

title: Cancellazione finestre aperte
content: Buongiorno, dopo avvio del PC non si sono più riaperte le mie due finestre con tutte le schede aperte. Credo ci sia stato un aggiornamento automatico nel mezzo. Ho provato da cronologia ma le finestre sono misteriosamente scomparse. Esiste la cronologia di navigazione, ma non le finestre chiuse di recente, tutto scomparso. Ho seguito la guida ma non ho risolto. Grazie a chi potrà aiutarmi.
